title: Game-Based Science Learning: Professional Competency Enhancement Through Role-Playing Simulation

context.prior_knowledge: Basic comprehension of scientific theories and ability to use digital devices
context.additional_context: Expert role-play learning utilizing VR/simulation tools in a BYOD environment

learning_goals: Learners can improve collaboration and decision-making skills in scientific problem-solving processes by 80% or more through virtual character role-playing.
Learners achieve 70% or higher accuracy in applying scientific principles through in-game simulation tasks.
Learners evaluate their ability to plan and execute self-directed learning in a game-based learning environment.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
